Sat, 11 May 2024 00:00:00 +0000 Chris Wiremu was instructing primary students in mau rākau, a martial art using Māori weapons, when authorities say he struck eight of the children.

Senior Mongols gang member on the run for 12 months, armed police find loaded shotgun under couch within reach of child https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/senior-mongols-gang-member-on-the-run-for-12-months-armed-police-find-loaded-shotgun-under-couch-within-儿童触及范围/MFCDIGZXGJA5DEZ52LI2BFWLGQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/senior-mongols-gang-member-on-the-run-for-12-months-armed-police-find-loaded-shotgun-under-couch-within-儿童触及范围/MFCDIGZXGJA5DEZ52LI2BFWLGQ/ Jared Savage, Katie HarrisName suppression lifted when the gang's 'orchestrating influence' was sentenced. Fri, 10 May 2024 17:03:00 +0000 The Mongols are an international motorcycle gang which established a chapter in New Zealand in 2019. Senior members have been convicted of serious drugs, firearms and violence offences.
